description.raw:
## Style

Unify style so it's easier to compare files

* Using 2 space indentation on all files, see diff without whitespace here: #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/37?w=1

* Alphabetize dependencies

* Use `yaml` extension

* Removed `# version n` from some files that had it

## Dependency changes

* Change all `ign-tools` `default` to `ign-tools0`
* Blueprint use `ign-launch` `default` (i.e. v1)
* Added `ign-tools` to `ign-gui2`
* Added `ign-launch1.yaml`, which is identical to `collection-blueprint`

## Removal

* Removed `ign-default`, since it should match `collection-blueprint`. We should create `collection-citadel` once blueprint is released.
